Photos

Homer's Odyssey, Pseudo-Callisthenes's Alexander Romance, Marco Polo's Book of the Marvels of the World, and Jonathan Swift's Gulliver's Travels are stories about mythical, magical, and exciting travels. Our life journey is equally exciting. You can find some places from my journey through my camera lenses on this page; here is some of my favorite "journey music" to spice it up! Click on a photo to view the collection!
